title: Analyze failed build: build-arch #2967 (s390x)
description: c10s s390x build failed - needs investigation

comments.author: Clement Verna
comments.text:
## Root Cause Analysis

**Failed tests:** kola tests on s390x

**Error pattern:**
Multiple kola tests failed with the same root cause:
- ext.config.shared.networking.nmstate.policy
- ext.config.shared.ignition.systemd-enable-units

**Root cause:** chronyd.service failed to start on test VMs
```
machine failed basic checks: detected failed or stuck systemd units: 
some systemd units failed: chronyd.service
```

**Impact:** All test VMs failed basic health checks before tests could run

**Possible causes:**
1. NTP/chrony configuration issue specific to s390x
2. Network connectivity issue preventing chronyd from syncing
3. Infrastructure issue with s390x test environment

**Recommended actions:**
1. Check if this is a recurring issue on s390x builds
2. Review chronyd configuration in the base image
3. Check s390x infrastructure health

comments.author: Clement Verna
comments.text: **Update:** This is NOT a recurring issue. Previous 6 s390x builds all succeeded. Likely a transient infrastructure issue. Consider re-triggering the build.
